title: Samurai Blade : Rock, Paper & Scissors
shortDesc_es: Breve descripción de Samurai Blade : Rock, Paper & Scissors
shortDesc_en: Short description for Samurai Blade : Rock, Paper & Scissors
longDesc_es: Descripción larga de Samurai Blade : Rock, Paper & Scissors.
longDesc_en: Samurai Blade: Rock, Paper & Scissors is an action arcade title that reimagines the classic Rock-Paper-Scissors showdown in a stylized feudal Japan setting.
